body: vim.api.nvim_create_autocmd("FileType", {
pattern = "${1:ft}",
callback = function()
end,
<!-- From ${2} ==> To ${1} (Snippet: connect 2 station with one line) delete this after finish -->
<node nodeID="${1}_N-0" description="" kilometre="4.0" x="5" xNet="5" y="0" yNet="0" />
<node nodeID="${1}_N-1" description="" kilometre="2.5" x="3.0" xNet="3.0" y="0" yNet="0" />
<node nodeID="${1}_NB-11" description="" kilometre="2.5" x="3.0" xNet="3.0" y="0" yNet="0" />
<track nodeID="${1}_T-1" trackID="T-1" stationID="${1}" description="Station ${1} Track 1" kilometre="3.0" x="4" xNet="4" y="0" yNet="0" />
<track nodeID="${1}_B-1" trackID="B-1" stationID="${1}" description="Station ${1} Track 1" kilometre="3.0" x="4" xNet="4" y="0" yNet="0" />
<node nodeID="${1}_S-0" description="" kilometre="4.0" x="5" xNet="5" y="0" yNet="0" />
<node nodeID="${1}_S-1" description="" kilometre="4.0" x="5" xNet="5" y="0" yNet="0" />
<node nodeID="${1}_SB-11" description="" kilometre="4.0" x="5" xNet="5" y="0" yNet="0" />
<!-- Substutute from here!!! if adding a new station -->
<node nodeID="Dummy_N-0" description="" kilometre="4.0" x="5" xNet="5" y="0" yNet="0" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="${3:5000}" source="${2}_S-0" target="${1}_N-0" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="10" source="${1}_N-0" target="${1}_N-1" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="500" source="${1}_N-1" target="${1}_T-1" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="10" source="${1}_N-1" target="${1}_NB-11" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="500" source="${1}_NB-11" target="${1}_B-1" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="500" source="${1}_T-1" target="${1}_S-1" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="500" source="${1}_B-1" target="${1}_SB-11" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="10" source="${1}_SB-11" target="${1}_S-1" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="10" source="${1}_S-1" target="${1}_S-0" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<!-- Substitute the new link from here!!! -->
<link gradient="0.0" length="5000" source="${1}_S-0" target="Dummy_N-0" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<!-- End Link -->
<stationRoute name="" description="" stationID="${2}" nodes=" ${2}_S-0 ${1}_N-0 "/>
<stationRoute name="" description="" stationID="${1}" nodes=" ${1}_N-0 ${1}_N-1 ${1}_T-1 ${1}_S-1"/>
<stationRoute name="" description="" stationID="${1}" nodes=" ${1}_N-0 ${1}_N-1 ${1}_NB-11 ${1}_B-1 ${1}_SB-11"/>
<stationRoute name="" description="" stationID="${1}" nodes=" ${1}_T-1 ${1}_S-1 ${1}_S-0 "/>
<stationRoute name="" description="" stationID="${1}" nodes=" ${1}_B-1 ${1}_SB-11 ${1}_S-1 ${1}_S-0 "/>
<!-- Substutute from this line if you want to add a new station -->
<stationRoute name="" description="" stationID="${1}" nodes=" ${1}_S-0 Dummy_N-0 "/>
<!-- End Route -->
<!-- From ${2} ==> To ${1} (Snippet: connect 2 station with) delete this after finish -->
<node nodeID="${1}_N-0" description="" kilometre="4.0" x="5" xNet="5" y="0" yNet="0" />
<node nodeID="${1}_N-1" description="" kilometre="2.5" x="3.0" xNet="3.0" y="0" yNet="0" />
<node nodeID="${1}_NB-11" description="" kilometre="2.5" x="3.0" xNet="3.0" y="0" yNet="0" />
<node nodeID="${1}_NB-21" description="" kilometre="2.5" x="3.0" xNet="3.0" y="0" yNet="0" />
<node nodeID="${1}_NA-11" description="" kilometre="2.5" x="3.0" xNet="3.0" y="0" yNet="0" />
<node nodeID="${1}_NA-21" description="" kilometre="2.5" x="3.0" xNet="3.0" y="0" yNet="0" />
<track nodeID="${1}_T-1" trackID="T-1" stationID="${1}" description="Station ${1} Track T-1" kilometre="3.0" x="4" xNet="4" y="0" yNet="0" />
<track nodeID="${1}_B-1" trackID="B-1" stationID="${1}" description="Station ${1} Track B-1" kilometre="3.0" x="4" xNet="4" y="0" yNet="0" />
<track nodeID="${1}_B-2" trackID="B-2" stationID="${1}" description="Station ${1} Track B-2" kilometre="3.0" x="4" xNet="4" y="0" yNet="0" />
<track nodeID="${1}_A-1" trackID="B-1" stationID="${1}" description="Station ${1} Track B-1" kilometre="3.0" x="4" xNet="4" y="0" yNet="0" />
<track nodeID="${1}_A-2" trackID="B-2" stationID="${1}" description="Station ${1} Track B-2" kilometre="3.0" x="4" xNet="4" y="0" yNet="0" />
<node nodeID="${1}_S-0" description="" kilometre="4.0" x="5" xNet="5" y="0" yNet="0" />
<node nodeID="${1}_S-1" description="" kilometre="4.0" x="5" xNet="5" y="0" yNet="0" />
<node nodeID="${1}_SB-11" description="" kilometre="4.0" x="5" xNet="5" y="0" yNet="0" />
<node nodeID="${1}_SB-21" description="" kilometre="4.0" x="5" xNet="5" y="0" yNet="0" />
<node nodeID="${1}_SA-11" description="" kilometre="4.0" x="5" xNet="5" y="0" yNet="0" />
<node nodeID="${1}_SA-21" description="" kilometre="4.0" x="5" xNet="5" y="0" yNet="0" />
<!-- Substutute from here!!! if adding a new station -->
<node nodeID="Dummy_N-0" description="" kilometre="4.0" x="5" xNet="5" y="0" yNet="0" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="${3:5000}" source="${2}_S-0" target="${1}_N-0" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="10" source="${1}_N-0" target="${1}_N-1" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="500" source="${1}_N-1" target="${1}_T-1" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="10" source="${1}_N-1" target="${1}_NA-11" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="10" source="${1}_N-1" target="${1}_NB-11" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="10" source="${1}_NB-11" target="${1}_NB-21" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="500" source="${1}_NB-11" target="${1}_B-1" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="500" source="${1}_NB-21" target="${1}_B-2" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="10" source="${1}_NA-11" target="${1}_NA-21" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="500" source="${1}_NA-11" target="${1}_A-1" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="500" source="${1}_NA-21" target="${1}_A-2" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="500" source="${1}_T-1" target="${1}_S-1" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="500" source="${1}_B-1" target="${1}_SB-11" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="500" source="${1}_B-2" target="${1}_SB-21" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="10" source="${1}_SB-11" target="${1}_S-1" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="10" source="${1}_SB-21" target="${1}_SB-11" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="500" source="${1}_A-1" target="${1}_SA-11" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="500" source="${1}_A-2" target="${1}_SA-21" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="10" source="${1}_SA-11" target="${1}_S-1" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="10" source="${1}_SA-21" target="${1}_SA-11" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<link gradient="0.0" length="10" source="${1}_S-1" target="${1}_S-0" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<!-- SuAstitute the new link from here!!! -->
<link gradient="0.0" length="5000" source="${1}_S-0" target="Dummy_N-0" vmax="160" vmaxr="160" />
<!-- End Link -->
<stationRoute name="" description="" stationID="${2}" nodes=" ${2}_S-0 ${1}_N-0 "/>
<stationRoute name="" description="" stationID="${1}" nodes=" ${1}_N-0 ${1}_N-1 ${1}_T-1 ${1}_S-1"/>
<stationRoute name="" description="" stationID="${1}" nodes=" ${1}_N-0 ${1}_N-1 ${1}_NB-11 ${1}_B-1 ${1}_SB-11"/>
<stationRoute name="" description="" stationID="${1}" nodes=" ${1}_N-0 ${1}_N-1 ${1}_NB-11 ${1}_NB-21 ${1}_B-2 ${1}_SB-21"/>
<stationRoute name="" description="" stationID="${1}" nodes=" ${1}_N-0 ${1}_N-1 ${1}_NA-11 ${1}_A-1 ${1}_SA-11"/>
<stationRoute name="" description="" stationID="${1}" nodes=" ${1}_N-0 ${1}_N-1 ${1}_NA-11 ${1}_NA-21 ${1}_A-2 ${1}_SA-21"/>
<stationRoute name="" description="" stationID="${1}" nodes=" ${1}_T-1 ${1}_S-1 ${1}_S-0 "/>
<stationRoute name="" description="" stationID="${1}" nodes=" ${1}_B-1 ${1}_SB-11 ${1}_S-1 ${1}_S-0 "/>
<stationRoute name="" description="" stationID="${1}" nodes=" ${1}_B-2 ${1}_SB-21 ${1}_SB-11 ${1}_S-1 ${1}_S-0 "/>
<stationRoute name="" description="" stationID="${1}" nodes=" ${1}_A-1 ${1}_SA-11 ${1}_S-1 ${1}_S-0 "/>
<stationRoute name="" description="" stationID="${1}" nodes=" ${1}_A-2 ${1}_SA-21 ${1}_SA-11 ${1}_S-1 ${1}_S-0 "/>
<!-- Substutute from this line if you want to add a new station -->
<stationRoute name="" description="" stationID="${1}" nodes=" ${1}_S-0 Dummy_N-0 "/>
<!-- End Route -->
